sentences.sentence: These foods tend to constipate you.
I constipate very easily so I can't eat eggs.
sentences.translation: 我很容易便秘所以不能吃蛋。

sentences.sentence: It has the main treatment effects on the following as: inappetence, poor appetite, stuffy feeling in chest, stool constipate, sputum stasis, fat body, ebriety, naupathia and others.
sentences.translation: 主治食欲不振、胃口不开、脘痞胸闷、大便秘结、痰涎壅滞、形体肥胖、酒醉恶心等病症。
